transcript.text: Johnson Controls expects all its employees to understand how competition laws affect their actions and decisions at work.

panelText.text: The laws governing fair competition can be complex, so always consult with a member of the Johnson Controls Law or Compliance team if you have questions regarding specific business practices.

If in doubt about competition laws:
  • seek guidance from the Law or Compliance team
  • consult the Johnson Controls Global Antitrust and Fair Competition Policy

If you witness or suspect any noncompliance with competition laws or Johnson Controls policies, you have a duty to report it. You can:
  • tell your manager or the Law or Compliance team
  • call or log the concern on the Johnson Controls Integrity Helpline
